title: [Large-Scale] Web-Based Authentic Assessment System Design and Operation Workshop: Applying Social Learning Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in web-based learning platforms and experience with assessment tools, along with foundational understanding of social learning theories (collaborative learning, role division, etc.)
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment for practicing professionals to strengthen practical assessment tool development skills, conducting BYOD-based collaborative projects. Emphasizes assessment design reflecting social learning theories (group dynamics, civic engagement).

learning_goals: Design at least three types of assessment tools based on social learning scenarios (role-play, case analysis, etc.) that simulate real workplace situations.
Develop evaluation rubrics incorporating peer and expert feedback, and derive improvement plans reflecting civic competency enhancement elements.
Operate a process-centered assessment (CBA) system using online forums/live sessions to evaluate collaborative problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
